title: so i got reported for what well nothing
body: so i was having fun on bots cause i needed some ip an i just got karthus so i was ksing 1st it was by mistake then he got mad said he would report me an his friend an reported me cause he was mad an he was hating me threw out the match an i wanna ask u guys is it  fair lol

replies.body: im sorry but i can tell by you're post you're either toxic, annoying or just in general detrimental to the game and deserve to be punished. you of course dont see whats wrong so maybe you should live longer than 12 years to better understand the social constructs of humanity and specifically for video game etiquette right now
Age shouldn't determine someone's enjoy-ability of an all age game.
lol why are u so mad XD this is why people hate LoL cause of people like u who make things to srsly

Well, if you did nothing wrong you've got nothing to worry about. That simple.

There are always going to be people who falsely report others, but Riot is pretty good at figuring out which reports are accurate and which reports aren't. In the end they're going to be the ones on the receiving end, and you'll get off free assuming you've not broken any rules.
